 ::ng-deep .mat-tooltip {
-  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6) !important; /* Semi-transparent black */

   padding: 5px 10px; /* Adjust padding for horizontal rectangle */
   text-align: center;
   max-width: 300px; /* Restrict width */
